author: jstrachan
msg: Stopped using QueueRequestor and TopicRequestor in the call() method and now use our own mechanism instead.
This allows us to reuse a temporary destination per thread as well as one day we could start pooling MessageProducers or MessageConsumers.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the code so that MessageConsumer instances are properly closed after they are used. Moving forward we should consider implementing pooling of MessageConsumer instances.

author: jstrachan
msg: Refactored the session pooling code to make things much more simple and clear
Also only one thread has a temporary queue so that multi-threaded call() functions should not step on each others toes.
Finally added a ConsumerTask for consuming JMS messages via Ant.

author: jstrachan
msg: patched dependency to use latest name of servlet jar...
